item.title: Building highly-available HPC infrastructure on AWS
item.description: In this blog post, we will explain how to launch highly available HPC clusters across an AWS Region. The solution is deployed using the AWS Cloud Developer Kit (AWS CDK), a software development framework for defining cloud infrastructure in code and provisioning it through AWS CloudFormation, hiding the complexity of integration between the components. Read the full post at the AWS HPC Blog.
